author: goni
body:
Update for HLT object monitoring related 2018 PbPb run.
1.copy from plugins/HLTObjectMonitoringProtonLead.cc to plugins/HLTObjectMonitoringHI.cc
2.make python/HLTObjectMonitoringLeadLead_cfi.py[1] and adding HLT path, parameters
3.put [1] corresponding with pp_on_AA_2018 in python/HLTObjectMonitoring_cff.py
@BetterWang @stahlleiton
title: HLT object monitoring for HI Run in DQMOnline
